en: The Mighty One, God, Jehovah, hath spoken, And called the earth from the rising of the sun unto the going down thereof.
hmr: Iengkimthawthei, Pathien ngei, LALPA chun thu a hril a, Leihnuoi hi nisa suoknaa inthawka a tlâkna chenin a ko tah a.

en: Out of Zion, the perfection of beauty, God hath shined forth.
hmr: Mawi famkimna, Ziona inthawk chun, Pathien chu a var suok tah a.

en: Our God cometh, and doth not keep silence: A fire devoureth before him, And it is very tempestuous round about him.
hmr: Ei Pathien chu hung a ta, to zing naw nih: A hmatieng chun mei kâng dur dur a ta, A vêla chun thlipui nasatak hrâng bawk a tih.

en: He calleth to the heavens above, And to the earth, that he may judge his people:
hmr: A mihai ro a rêl theina dingin, Chungtieng vânhai le hnuoi hi ko a tih,

en: Gather my saints together unto me, Those that have made a covenant with me by sacrifice.
hmr: “Ka mi inthienghai, ka kuomah hung ṭhuoi khâwm ro, Ran thata inthâwia ka kuoma thu thlungtuhai chu,” tiin.

en: And the heavens shall declare his righteousness; For God is judge himself. [Selah
hmr: Chuongchun, vânhai khin a felna chu tlânginsampui a ta, Ama Pathien ngei chu rorêltu a ni sih a.

en: Hear, O my people, and I will speak; O Israel, and I will testify unto thee: I am God, even thy God.
hmr: “Aw ka mihai, ngai ta u, thu ka hril ding a nih, Aw Israel, ngai ta, kân hriettir ding che a nih: Kei hi Pathien, i Pathien ngei chu ka ni hi,

en: I will not reprove thee for thy sacrifices; And thy burnt-offerings are continually before me.
hmr: I inthâwinahai leiin kâwk naw ning chengah a, I pumrawhmang thilinhlânhai chu ka hmaah a um rân sih a.

en: I will take no bullock out of thy house, Nor he-goats out of thy folds.
hmr: I ina inthawk chu bâwngchal hrim hrim la suok naw ning, I ran huona inthawkhai chun kêltehai khawm la suok bawk naw ning.

en: For every beast of the forest is mine, And the cattle upon a thousand hills.
hmr: Ramhnuoia sa tinrênghai hi ka ta a ni sih a, Tlâng sâng khat lai chunga ran umhai khawm chu.

en: I know all the birds of the mountains; And the wild beasts of the field are mine.
hmr: Tlânga vate po po ka hriet vawng a, Ramsahai khawm hi ka ta a nih.

en: If I were hungry, I would not tell thee; For the world is mine, and the fulness thereof.
hmr: Phîngṭâm lang khawm hril naw ning cheng a, Leihnuoi le a sûnga thil um po pohai hi ka ta a ni sih a.

en: Will I eat the flesh of bulls, Or drink the blood of goats?
hmr: Bâwngchal sa ka fâkin, Kêl thisen ka dâwn ding am a nih?

en: Offer unto God the sacrifice of thanksgiving; And pay thy vows unto the Most High;
hmr: Pathien kuoma lâwmthu hril- na inthâwina inhlân lem la, I thutiem khawm Achunghnungtak kuomah hlen rawh.

en: And call upon me in the day of trouble: I will deliver thee, and thou shalt glorify me.
hmr: Chun, lunginzîng ni chun mi ko la, Sanhim ka ti che, chuongchun, nangin i mi chawimawi ding annâwm,” a tih a.

en: But unto the wicked God saith, What hast thou to do to declare my statutes, And that thou hast taken my covenant in thy mouth,
hmr: Mi rilo kuoma ruok chun Pathienin, “Ka thuruothai hrilsuok theina i nei am a nih? Annawleh, ka thuthlung hi iengtizieha i baua sâm am i ni a?

en: Seeing that thou hatest instruction, And castest my words behind thee?
hmr: Thunun i theidah a, Ka thuhai hi i hnungtieng i dehâwn pei sih a.

en: When thou sawest a thief, thou consentedst with him, And hast been partaker with adulterers.
hmr: Inru i hmu chun i remtipui a, Uirepahai hlak în kawppui bawk hlak.

en: Thou givest thy mouth to evil, And thy tongue frameth deceit.
hmr: I bau hi suol kuomah i pêk a, I lei hin hlêmna a siem bawk hlak.

en: Thou sittest and speakest against thy brother; Thou slanderest thine own mother’s son.
hmr: Ṭhungpumin i unau i sawi- sêl a, Mâni nuhai naupasalhai ngei chu i hêk hlak.

en: These things hast thou done, and I kept silence; Thou thoughtest that I was altogether such a one as thyself: But I will reprove thee, and set them in order before thine eyes.
hmr: Chuong thil chu i thawh a; nisienlakhawm, ka to zing a; Chuongchun, nangma ang charah i mi ruot hlak a, Nisienlakhawm, kâwk ka ti cheh a, i mithmuah indawt peiin suklang ka tih.

en: Now consider this, ye that forget God, Lest I tear you in pieces, and there be none to deliver:
hmr: Nangni Pathien theinghiltuhai, hi hi ngaituo ta u khai! Chuong naw chun, keinâwi ka ti cheu a, nangni sanhimtu hrim an um âwm si nawh a.

en: Whoso offereth the sacrifice of thanksgiving glorifieth me; And to him that ordereth his way aright Will I show the salvation of God.
hmr: Tukhawm lâwmthu hril inthawina inhlân taphawt chun a mi chawimawi hlak, Chun, a um dân takinningtaka vawngtu kuoma chun, Pathien sandamna inentir ka tih,” a tih a.
